properties.style: vertical-align: top; background-color: #f1f1f1; background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, to(#f8f8f8), color-stop(40%, #f1f1f1)); background-image: -o-linear-gradient(to right,#f1f1f1 40%, #f8f8f8); background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(to right,#f1f1f1 40%, #f8f8f8); background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(to right,#f1f1f1 40%, #f8f8f8); background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(to right,#f1f1f1 40%, #f8f8f8); background-image: linear-gradient(to right,#f1f1f1 40%, #f8f8f8);
